nodes.title: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos
nodes.description: Learn how to easily add subtitles to your YouTube videos to enhance accessibility and reach a wider audience.
nodes.coverAlt: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos

nodes.title: Top 5 Translation Tools for Professionals and Learners
nodes.description: Discover the top 5 translation tools to enhance your professional and learning experiences. Learn about their features, pros, and cons in this article!
nodes.coverAlt: Top 5 Translation Tools for Professionals and Learners

nodes.title: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation
nodes.description: In the age of digital connectivity, leveraging video translation can play a pivotal role in raising awareness and mobilizing communities worldwide to protect and preserve our rivers.
nodes.coverAlt: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI Translates Backroads Picture Masterpiece: Why Is Movie Translation Important?
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI translated Backroad Picture's masterpiece 'Chasing The Bono'. Find out why movie translation is important.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI Translates 'Chasing the Bono' - A Backroads Picture Masterpiece

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund
nodes.description: Our journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund, the power of positive feedback, and our next steps. #bushfiremitigation #resilience
nodes.coverAlt: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey With the Forest Fire Commercialization Fund

nodes.title: Multiple Ways To Translate Your YouTube Videos

nodes.description: Our team tried using Vixer video editor on iPhone so you know what to expect before downloading the app. Check it out here!

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Familyâ€™s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.title: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry
nodes.description: We have summarised news from the translation technology industry that covers the latest advancements in methods to preserve a dying language and break language barriers.
nodes.coverAlt: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry

nodes.title: 10 TikTok Content Ideas
nodes.description: Do you want to start publishing contents on TikTok or simply just do not know what contents to put? We have summarised 10 TikTok content ideas for you!
nodes.coverAlt: 10 TikTok Content Ideas

nodes.title: 10 Tips That Actually Work If You Want To Learn A New Language
nodes.description: Are you struggling to learn a new language? We have wrapped up 10 tips on how to learn a new language! Find out more in this article
nodes.coverAlt: 10 Tips That Actually Work If You Want To Learn A New Language

nodes.title: The Importance Of Learning A Foreign Language
nodes.description: Ever wondered why learning a foreign language is so important? Find out here as we discuss the 3 main importances of learning a foreign language

nodes.title: Why Should You Translate Video Content: A Client Perspective
nodes.description: A prospect who runs a professional YouTube channel wanted to convert his content from English to German.
nodes.coverAlt: A clients perspective on why you should translate video content.

nodes.title: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
nodes.description: AI transcription is now a standard feature in productivity toolkits. What does this mean for your business?
nodes.coverAlt: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools

nodes.title: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation To Empower Occupational Therapists
nodes.description: Working with developmentally challenged children is very rewarding work. Read how NSW Health is using video translation to help its occupational therapists.
nodes.coverAlt: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation

nodes.title: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions
nodes.description: Community captions are a function in YouTube. This function allows a YouTuber to crowd source captions. YouTube is shutting this down. Here is how it will affect you!
nodes.coverAlt: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions

nodes.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
nodes.description: Vyasa University is working to raise awareness about Covid-19. Read more about how they used video translation to reach stakeholders across 8 Indian languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation

nodes.title: How QAChef Is Reaching Clients In A Tough Market
nodes.description: QAChef a tech company in hospitality - is using video translation in Chinese and Arabic to gain new clients in a tough climate using marketing localization and marketing internationalization.
nodes.coverAlt: Bagaimana QAChef Menjangkau Klien Di Pasar yang Sulit

nodes.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
nodes.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

nodes.title: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI
nodes.description:
AI internationalization has a important role to play in boosting your
  video ROI or ROAS. What are the options, and how can you optimize your content production
  process to take advantage of this mega-trend?
nodes.coverAlt: AI Internationalization: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI

nodes.title: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!
nodes.description:
We're focusing on the good news today, throughout all this devastation
  and chaos, there are people helping and trying to make the situation better in any
  way that they can.
nodes.coverAlt: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!

nodes.title: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?
nodes.description:
As a content creator and/or influencer engagement is top of mind. Using
  captions is a clear opportunity to increase engagement. What is the best subtitling
  and/or captioning software out there? Should you use a single tool to create the
  subtitles and a different one to merge them in?
nodes.coverAlt: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?

nodes.title: How Safe Is AI Transcription: What You Need To Know
nodes.description:
You are a content creator who uses AI. But how safe is the AI you use,
  whether for transcription, translation or dubbing. Also some tips on how to use
  AI better in your journey into expanding your market.
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese
nodes.description:
You make videos in English - how can you translate these videos into
  Filipino and Chinese? We'll show you how to translate video and also how to deploy
  making sure you have amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO
nodes.description:
How to translate a YouTube video? If you are a content creator on YouTube,
  you want to translate your video into different languages. This makes your audience
  bigger, and you get SEO benefits. This blog post shows you how to translate your
  YouTube videos, and deliver them to other social channels too.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO

nodes.title: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI
nodes.description:
How to translate your video content into Mandarin Chinese? Also known
  as clipping a video into Chinese, or a Chinese video maker, and how to deploy this
  content for amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI

nodes.title: Fighting the Coronavirus and E. Coli with Machine Learning
nodes.description:
When it comes to combating superbugs and viruses, the human raced needs
  all the help it can get. Artificial Intelligence is being implemented to find treatments
  to fight bacteria that was formally resistant to all forms of antibiotics.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Humans

nodes.title: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It
nodes.description: the transcription or translation depending upon what you are trying to do. '
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It: AI Failed Rocketship

nodes.title: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator
nodes.description:
day we look at two very different approaches to building a video translator,
  first a one shot system including lip syncing. Secondly our own app, and some of
  the design decisions we have taken which are very human centred.
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator

nodes.title: AI & Wildlife Preservation
nodes.description:
If there's one thing most of us can agree on, it's that wildlife preservation
  is important. Using Artificial Intelligence, researchers are fighting the good fight
  against wildlife population decline. And in a surprising twist, AI might just help
  us win this fight.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Animals

nodes.title: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages
nodes.description:
We recently came across an article with the exciting news that the Indian
  government is planning on making its Internet content available in regional languages
  to remove the language barrier among Indians.
nodes.coverAlt: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages

nodes.title: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life
nodes.coverAlt: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life

nodes.title: One place, many languages
nodes.description:
We're talking language today and how diverse it can be even in the same
  country, or city! Germany is still a country divided when it comes to what a pancake
  should be called - maybe they should be called egg-cakes? Also Mandarin is now Melbourne
  and Sydney's most widely spoken community language.
nodes.coverAlt: One place, many languages

nodes.title: Where are we heading with AI computing in the 2020s? And how human can they   really become?
nodes.description:
We now well and truly know that Artificial Intelligence is here to stay,
  but what will become of it, and us, in the future?
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 21/01/20

nodes.title: Patch Notes: January 2020
nodes.description:
Patch Notes for January 2020: spaces are allowed; transcription without
  time-coding; transcription copy function;
nodes.coverAlt: Patch Notes: January 2020

nodes.title: Happy New Year 2020!
nodes.description:
We had a very good 2019 here at Video Translator. We started to get some
  traction, we found a niche where our tech was useful, and slowly slowly things started
  to come together. We think big things are ahead of us in 2020!
nodes.coverAlt: Happy New Year 2020!

nodes.title: Patch Notes: September 2019

  September 2019.

nodes.title: How Video Transcription Works Explainer
nodes.description:
We have been working really hard on our app. We have added a new architecture
  to our video processing, a few more languages as well as changes to the look and
  feel of the product. All in all, we felt it was time for a new explainer video which
  covered how to use the platform.
